name: MotionDesignV1 (3Dart,C4D style)
description:
The model can generate the current popular 3D Motion Design style images

This style is relatively rare, so I wanted to train one

This version I used 400 pictures as training data set, modifying the tag is a terrible amount of work, before I didn't spend much time to test more other styles, maybe it will produce better results, you can try to make your own favorite pictures, I believe you can make more beautiful pictures than the cover.

And the style of the flowers comes from an artist on behance, his name is ATOM63, if you are interested, you can check it out

This model is totally free and I hope you can enjoy it!
